ORDER - the parties have reported a Settlement; all dates and deadlines previously established, including the 3/2/09 Trial Date and the 2/24/09 Final Pretrial Conference, are Vacated and any pending Motions are Denied as Moot. Parties are ORDERED to finalize their agreement and file the appropriate documents on or before 6/13/08. Failure to do so will result in a DISMISSAL WITH PREJUDICE pursuant to Fed.R.Civ.P. 41(b). Signed by Judge Sarah Evans Barker on 5/9/08.(MAC) (Entered: 05/09/2008)
